car_hall_description: The Car Venue in Jeddah is one of the leading venues for organizing events related to the world of cars and vehicles. It can include the following description: The Car Hall in Jeddah is a modern and spacious area, designed to host exhibitions and related events.
accessibility_description: If you have special accessibility needs, please contact the venue using the information provided in the booking confirmation you will receive after booking.
policy_privacy_description: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. All the information you provide is used solely to enhance user experience and will not be shared with third parties without your prior consent.
policy_terms_of_use_description1: - Use the platform for legitimate purposes only.
policy_terms_of_use_description2: - Do not misuse any of the application's features.
policy_payment_description: All financial transactions through Venut are carried out using secure payment methods. In case of any payment-related issues, please contact technical support within 48 hours of the transaction.
policy_cancellation_refund_description: All financial transactions through Venut are carried out using secure payment methods. In case of any payment-related issues, please contact technical support within 48 hours of the transaction.

faq_modify_or_cancel_booking: Can I modify or cancel the booking after confirmation?

faqs.question: What is the Venut platform?
faqs.answer: Venut is a platform that allows users to book event Venues online.

faqs.question: How can I log in?
faqs.answer: You can log in by clicking the 'Login' button and entering your credentials.

faqs.question: Can I modify or cancel the booking after confirmation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel the booking as per the platform's policy.

faqs.question: What payment methods are available?
faqs.answer: Venut supports multiple payment methods, including credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: Is my personal data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, your personal data is protected using secure encryption and privacy policies.

dont_worry_offers: Don't worry, you'll never miss our offers. Just enter your email.
